texte: Generate a 3:2 scale image, a miniature creative scene in the shape of a capsule, with the capsule placed horizontally. Half of the capsule is in vibrant blue, printed with the white words "CALDAS NOVAS". The other half is transparent, showing a miniature of the real architectural characteristics of the tourist city of Caldas Novas in Goi√°s Brazil - scenes of people in the hot water pools, water slides and colored buoys. The general style is rendered in 3D, giving a dreamy feeling. It is made with C4D and the materials have a shiny appearance
